anyone here knows perl regex?: I wanna remove "- Grateful Dead - Fillmore West 1969 - The Complete Recordings - "  from file: "904 - Grateful Dead - Fillmore West 1969 - The Complete Recordings - Disc 09 - Morning Dew.flac"

it uses 's///' like substitutions, and can candle multiple files
there is a tool called rename that can do what you are asking.
rename 's/-\ Grateful\ Dead\ -\ Fillmore\ West\ 1969\ -\ The\ Complete\ Recordings\ -\ //' *.flac
